about_the_game:
To become the best ninja, you will have to do some training... dangerous training. But training nevertheless. Jump, climb, and sprint your way through levels that are... never the same? 

A real ninja has to be prepared for anything. Complete mini levels a certain amount of times to win. Catch is, every time you play a level, it will be different!

LEVELS ARE NEVER THE SAME?

That's right! Through seed based generation, you will never get the same level twice. Random obstacles and hazards are placed every time you attempt a level. You only get one chance, so unleash your inner ninja skills or its back to square one!

STORY MODE

Travel to different locations to train and become the best! Contains several levels where the structure remains the same, but obstacles and hazards that spawn in are completely random!

RANDOM MODE

Levels are procedurally generated. Never play the same level twice with millions of different possibilities!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR NINJA

Show the world you are the best ninja with different cosmetics that can only be earned by completing difficult tasks!

name: No Room For Error

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
